Name: The Southern Alliance
Ingredients: 20 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherries .
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish, along with skewered maraschino cherry.
Review: Brandy shines with a delicate fruitiness in this dryish, bittersweet stirred cocktail served on the rocks.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Angelos Bafas at Fabrica Cocktail Bar in Drama, Greece.
